publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7733 Gil Paterson on behalf of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee: The Interpretation and Legislative Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 and other subordinate legislation Standing Order rule changes—That the Parliament notes the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee’s 3rd Report 2010 (Session 3), The Interpretation and Legislative Reform (Scotland) Act 2010 and other subordinate legislation Standing Order rule changes (SP Paper 465), and agrees that changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 6 April 2011. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone*
